For those who are not using VSCode (or other similar IDE), you can automate port-forwarding for Jupyter Notebook by adding the following line of code to your
~/.ssh/config file (under the mlops-zoomcamp host):
LocalForward 127.0.0.1:8899 127.0.0.1:8899
Then you can launch Jupyter Notebook using the following command: jupyter notebook --port=8899 --no-browser and copy paste the notebook URL into your browser.
Added by Vishal
